name: Get That Copter!
description:
Get That Copter!

The world has been infested with zombies! You keep running for your life until you notice a rescue helicopter passing by. Will you get that copter in time or will you be eaten alive?

FEATURES:
  • Temple Run inspired platforming gameplay
  • Four challenging levels and many abilities to use
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Minimum 260 MB available space
  • PC Windows only
  • Keyboard / Mouse
CONTROLS: Keyboard: Input:Left / Right Arrow keys MoveUp Arrow keyJump Down Arrow keyJump Cancel / SlideLeft Mouse ButtonSelectEsc Pause / Resume

(This game is a student project made in 8 weeks, created by 13 students at The Game Assembly. Credits is shown in the game. No further development will be made.)
